synopsis.text:
Now, meet Kyousuke Iwaki and Youji Katou, two ambitious actors striving to make their mark in the film industry after having starred in numerous adult films. Iwaki secures a coveted role in a popular movie, outshining Katou in the auditions. As they continue their journey together, Katou finds himself falling for Iwaki, who struggles to accept his own feelings.

The lines between fiction and reality begin to blur when both actors are invited to work together on a new film series. With Iwaki still uncertain about his emotions, he inadvertently causes pain to Katou and himself. The return of a scandal-ridden actor to Japan further complicates the situation, making it seem hopeless for the pair.

As they navigate through their complex relationship, the two actors must confront their true feelings and face the challenges that come with love in the world of show business. Will they find the courage to follow their hearts and embrace their love for one another?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
